quizChooses.title: Complete the following
qtitle: Look at the image then answer
The corresponding image illustrates the height of the apple above the ground:

questions.paragraph: Which apple has more potential energy?
What is the type of the potential energy shown in the image?
When switching on a handheld flashlight powered by batteries, it emits light. mention the reason.
popup: Because the chemical energy stored in the batteries transforms into electrical energy, which, in turn, converts to light energy.

questions.paragraph: What are the factors that potential energy depend on?
popup: Mass/ the hieght of the object from the ground

questions.paragraph: Mention two types of energy possessed by a car moving on one of the overpasses.
Mention one example of a device or tool that converts potential energy into kinetic energy.
What happens to the energy during the fall of the ball towards the Earth?
popup: Potential energy is converted into kinetic energy
